item.description:
Time to get officially started! Join Ron Paul folks--campaign and otherwise--for the first official NH lit drop. We'll walk door to door (lists provided) and distribute information on the next President of the United States.

NOTE: This is only the first of many lit drops that will be scheduled across the state (details to follow as soon as we've got them). So please come if you can--but don't burn yourself out coming from hours away. We'll be in your area, too.
item.name: First Lit Drop!
